content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with a current fuel of 50 coal and a status of FULL_OUTPUT. It is processing iron ore to produce copper plates.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to insert items. Check the furnace status to confirm it is ready to process.
  
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
